cwitools.params.loadparams¶

cwitools.params.loadparams(path)¶

Load a CWITools parameter file into a dictionary structure.

Parameters

path (str) – Path to CWITools parameter file.

Returns

Python dictionary containing CWITools parameters

Return type

dict

CWITools
